comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Mrs. W.K. Vanderbilt Sr, born Anne Harriman, married William Kissam Vanderbilt (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Kissam_Vanderbilt) in 1903. He was her third husband. www.faubourgmontmartre.com/ah1861.html See p. e. The Washington times., December 07, 1919, FINAL EDITION, The American Weekly, Page 33 New-York tribune., August 22, 1915, Page 5 Another Bain picture of her:

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for providing us with Mrs. Vanderbilt's name.  We'll include this info. next time we update
